skillTree.localised_description: The dominion of Chaos grows larger each day; soon the whole world will be under its sway.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Domination is the only goal, under the banner of Chaos Undivided.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: An aura of pure malevolence crackles and burns with energy, exuded from only those truly steeped in Chaos.
"Glory will be mine—my ascendance is inevitable!"

effects.description:
Experience gain: +15% for characters
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers stand unified in only one pursuit; the stark and utter destruction of Order.
Kill, crush, destroy—these are the tenets of Chaos!
Pain is a trivial price to pay in assuring the complete annihilation of Order!
The brand of the Ruinous Powers is seared into the skin, a mark of absolute dedication to the cause of corruption.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
No mortal host shall hold them back.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

skillTree.localised_description: All will bow before such a harbinger of pure, unbridled Chaos, oozing with the energies of corruption.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.
A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
